name: Elewar
description:
Elewar - Fantasy Bullet Heaven Game

Elewar is a fantasy based bullet heaven game with tons of unlocks, upgrades and crafting of super powerful items! With online leaderboards for the bravest!

Downloaded version is highly recommended to avoid laggy web behaviour.

Any feedback is highly appreciated! Thank you for playing

Join the games discord https://discord.gg/pFNNXAawXN

Controls:

  • Controller
  • Keyboard (WASD + Space)
  • Keyboard + Mouse (WASD + LeftClick)

Have fun :D
